definition: folk festival, esp. involving shrine or image of God
to welcome/to meet/to face/to forge ahead (esp. in the face of difficulties)
to compete/competition/match/to surpass/better than/superior to/to excel
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: Today, during religious festivals, two large lanterns are hung above the altar of the gods.
sentences.chinese: 今天迎神賽會上，神明的陣頭前仍有兩盞大燈籠。

sentences.english: The meeting the god competition has the general characteristic and certain social function.
sentences.chinese: 迎神賽會具有一般性特徵與一定的社會功能。
